daftar:
Hi, you are not registered yet. To use this feature, please register first. Type .register name.age
Example: .register John 1999.24
limit:
*❗Your limit has been exhausted, you cannot use this feature*
*To increase your limit, please type:*
*.claim (for daily claim)*
*.hour (for hourly claim)*
*.claimcoupon (for coupon claim)*
*.claimmoney (for money claim)*
*.buylimit amount (to buy limit)*
*Example: .buylimit 10*
*Limits will be replenished at 11:00 PM every night.*
banned:
❌ You have been banned and cannot use the bot.
Please contact the owner for assistance.
disable:
‍🐽 This feature has been disabled by the owner.
Contact the owner to enable it.
Type .owner
OnlyGroup: ❗This command can only be used in groups.
OnlyPM: ❗This command can only be used in private messages.
GrupAdmin: ❗This command can only be used by group admins.
OnlyOwner: ❗This command can only be used by the bot owner.
BotAdmin: ❗Make me an admin to use this command.
premium: ❗This command is only available for premium members. Please contact the owner.
groupOnly: 🐒 Use this command in a group only.
